analyzed: de las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis /

analyzed: mgon po 'od dpag tu med pa gdan drangs la gsang ba dang bcas pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod nas dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab par bya ste /

analyzed: thun mtshams gsum du rnam par bsgom zhing sngags bzlas par bya'o //

original: de nas sngags pas skyes pa'am bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas brtsams te thun mtshams gsum du khri phrag re nyi ma so so la bcom ldan 'das ma'i sku la dmigs la gos dmar po'i stod g-yogs bya'o //

translated: After that, one should meditate on a red hri·∏• syllable standing on a sun at one‚Äôs heart, which transforms into a red eight-petaled lotus reaching up to the womb, in the form of a stalk.

analyzed: de'i 'dab ma brgyad la bung ba brgyad do //

original: bar bar du dbyangs yig yongs su gyur pa las shin tu dga' zhing dgyes pa dang khro zhing chags pa'i go rims bzhin du rang gi sna'i rlung gis bskul te 'phur nas /

original: nyin mtshan thams cad du yang 'di bya'o //
analyzed: nyin mtshan thams cad du yang 'di bya'o //
translated: This should be done day and night.

original: de nas de myos par gyur te 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas de myos par gyur te 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, having become intoxicated, he will come.

original: sngags kyis bskul nas skra grol ba gos med pa 'dod pa myos pas non pa de thob nas rang gi yi dam gyi rnal 'byor gyis sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o //
analyzed: sngags kyis bskul nas skra grol ba gos med pa 'dod pa myos pas non pa de thob nas rang gi yi dam gyi rnal 'byor gyis sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o //
translated: Having obtained her, one should worship the mandala of the Buddha with the yoga of one's chosen deity.

original: gzhom par mi nus pa'i dngos grub rgya chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhom par mi nus pa'i dngos grub rgya chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: One will obtain the great power that cannot be overcome.

original: au tyan nas byung ba'i rigs byed ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: au tyan nas byung ba'i rigs byed ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sadhana of Kali born from the Udyana Tantra is complete.
